solution.text:
Curved surface area of the tent\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k*j),2)}}_\)sq.cm
Slant height of the tent,l\(=_{j}_\)cm
Curved surface area\(=\pi rl\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc((pi_val*k*j),2)}}_=\pi \times r \times _{j}_\)
\(\Rightarrow r = \frac{_{{trunc((pi_val*k*j),2)}}_}{\pi \times _{j}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow r= _{k}_\)cm
Therefore, the radius of the tent is \(_{k}_\)cm.

content.text:
The curved surface area of a conical tent made of canvas is \(_{{trunc((pi_val*k*j),2)}}_\)sq.cm. and its slant height is \(_{j}_\)cm. Find:
Radius of the tent?
